Your Central Portal for Products and Services

When it comes to products and services, Online Product Catalog is the central portal to be used by your staff.

Fast, Fault-Tolerant Search

Find products and services in all of your suppliers' catalogs and shops.

Intuitive Interface Design

As the system offers functions the user is familiar with from online shops, its easy usage is guaranteed.

Powerful Tools at Your Disposal

Filters, facets and advanced search features help to ensure quick acceptance and utilization.

Responsive Mobile Experience

OPC 8 responds to the device you use, serving you adequately on your desktop, your laptop, tablet or smartphone.

Customer Service

Short text describing what to expect from the customer service pages.

Need Help?

If you cannot find what you are looking for, if you need general assistance in your purchasing effort, please contact the purchasing helpdesk via phone:
+49 231 3967-0

Cannot Find What You Need?

If you cannot find any matching products, please use free-text order tool, which will guide you through define your own product, service and/or vendor if applicable.
